Class AnahataContextAnnotator

java.lang.Object
org.netbeans.modules.versioning.spi.VCSAnnotator
uno.anahata.ai.nb.vcs.AnahataContextAnnotator
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class AnahataContextAnnotator extends org.netbeans.modules.versioning.spi.VCSAnnotator implements PropertyChangeListener
Annotates files present in the Anahata AI context with a badge and tooltip.
